original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: phyag rgya bzhi gtan la dbab pa /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi gtan la dbab pa /

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the youthful Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: rnam dag ye shes de bdag nyid //
analyzed: rnam dag ye shes de bdag nyid //
translated: The nature of pure wisdom

original: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas nas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas nas //
translated: Having paid homage to Vajrasattva,

original: phyag rgya dgod pa mdor bsdus pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya dgod pa mdor bsdus pa //
translated: The concise presentation of the mudrƒÅs

original: bdag nyid go bya'i don du bri ;
analyzed: bdag nyid go bya'i don du bri ;
translated: Is written for the purpose of understanding oneself.

original: /'di na phyag rgya dgod pa la yid rnam par 'khrul cing rmongs pas srid pa'i rgya mtshor sdug bsngal zhing 'khyams pa de dag gis bde blag tu phyag rgya bzhi'i don khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas //
analyzed: /'di na phyag rgya dgod pa la yid rnam par 'khrul cing rmongs pas srid pa'i rgya mtshor sdug bsngal zhing 'khyams pa de dag gis bde blag tu phyag rgya bzhi'i don khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas //
translated: Here, those who are confused and deluded about the presentation of the mudrƒÅs, suffering and wandering in the ocean of existence, in order that they may easily understand the meaning of the four mudrƒÅs, following the tantras,

original: bde ba chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The means of accomplishing great bliss will be fully accomplished.

original: phyag rgya bzhi zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The four seals are the action seal, the reality seal, the great seal, and the pledge seal.

original: de la las kyi phyag rgya brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: de la las kyi phyag rgya brtag par bya ste /
translated: The action seal should be examined.

original: las kyi lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi bsam pa ste gtso bo'o //
analyzed: las kyi lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi bsam pa ste gtso bo'o //
translated: The action seal is the body, speech, and mind of the seal, and the intention is the chief.

original: phyag rgya ni brtags pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni brtags pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The seal is the nature of the imagination.

original: las kyi phyag rgya de las skad cig ma'i dbye bas phye bas dga' ba dag skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya de las skad cig ma'i dbye bas phye bas dga' ba dag skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From that action seal, the joys are produced by the division of the moments.

original: skad cig shes pa'i de yi shes //
analyzed: skad cig shes pa'i de yi shes //
translated: The knowledge of the moment is the knowledge of that.

original: ae wam la ni rab tu gnas //
analyzed: ae wam la ni rab tu gnas //
translated: It is well established in evam.

original: dga' ba bzhi ni dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / dga' bral lo //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi ni dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / dga' bral lo //
translated: The four joys are joy, supreme joy, special joy, and innate joy.

original: gzhan du na /
analyzed: gzhan du na /
translated: Otherwise,

original: @77b mchog dang dga' bral dag gi dbus //
analyzed: @77b mchog dang dga' bral dag gi dbus //
translated: in the middle of the supreme and the separation from joy,

original: mtshon byar brtags pas bstan par bya //
analyzed: mtshon byar brtags pas bstan par bya //
translated: the object of designation is taught.

original: zhes gsungs pa de 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa de 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That would not be tenable.

original: skad cig ma bzhi ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang / mtshan nyid bral ba dang / rnam par nyed pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma bzhi ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang / mtshan nyid bral ba dang / rnam par nyed pa'o //
translated: The four moments are the various aspects, the ripened, the absence of characteristics, and the dissolution.

original: mtshan nyid dang bral ba dbus su bstan pa ni dbang las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang bral ba dbus su bstan pa ni dbang las shes par bya'o //
translated: The absence of characteristics in the middle is taught to be understood from the empowerment.

original: dbang btsan thabs kyi sbyor ba ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa tha mar gnas par rtogs so //
analyzed: dbang btsan thabs kyi sbyor ba ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa tha mar gnas par rtogs so //
translated: The application of the powerful method is understood to be the absence of characteristics and the innate abiding in the end.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang btsan thabs kyi sbyor bas bstan to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang btsan thabs kyi sbyor bas bstan to //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn taught with the application of the powerful method.

original: de thams cad ni lhan cig skyes pa ste ;
analyzed: de thams cad ni lhan cig skyes pa ste ;
translated: All of that is innate.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i grib ma'i rjes su byed pa la lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya'o //üîΩlhan cig skyes pa'i grib ma ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i ye shes khong du chud par byed pas /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i grib ma'i rjes su byed pa la lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya'o // lhan cig skyes pa'i grib ma ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i ye shes khong du chud par byed pas /
translated: The innate is called ‚Äúinnate‚Äù because it follows the innate shadow.üîΩThe innate shadow is the innate, natural wisdom that is understood.

original: shes rab ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of the wisdom consort is innate.

original: de'i phyir nges par shes rab ye shes las ;
analyzed: de'i phyir nges par shes rab ye shes las ;
translated: Therefore, it is definitely innate.

original: / lhan cig skyes pa 'byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: / lhan cig skyes pa 'byung ba ma yin te /
translated: The innate does not arise.

original: gang gi phyir lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin ni chos thams cad ma bcos pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin ni chos thams cad ma bcos pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Because the nature called ‚Äúinnate‚Äù is the unfabricated intrinsic identity of all phenomena.

original: de'i phyir las kyi phyag rgya la brten nas rgyu mthun 'bras bu thob par byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir las kyi phyag rgya la brten nas rgyu mthun 'bras bu thob par byed do //
translated: Therefore, based on the karmamudra, one attains the result that is similar to the cause.

original: rgyu mthun pa ni rgyu dang 'dra bar 'byung bas na rgyu mthun pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa ni rgyu dang 'dra bar 'byung bas na rgyu mthun pa ste /
translated: The similar is similar to the cause, so it is similar.

original: ji ltar me long dang bzhin la brten nas byad bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba ni gzhan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar me long dang bzhin la brten nas byad bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba ni gzhan nyid ma yin te /
translated: Just as, based on a mirror and a face, the reflection of the face arises, it is not different.

original: sngon du grub pa ma yin la da ltar yang grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon du grub pa ma yin la da ltar yang grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not established before, and it is not established now.

original: de ni nges par gzhan gyi gzugs brnyan rgyu mthun tsam mthong ba la 'on kyang 'jig rten pa rnams rang bzhin mthong zhes 'khrul pas dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni nges par gzhan gyi gzugs brnyan rgyu mthun tsam mthong ba la 'on kyang 'jig rten pa rnams rang bzhin mthong zhes 'khrul pas dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That is definitely just the similar reflection of another. However, worldly people see the intrinsic nature and are delighted by the illusion.

original: de bzhin slob dpon blo gros dman pa rnams kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin slob dpon blo gros dman pa rnams kyang /
translated: In the same way, inferior masters

original: shes rab ye shes bsgrubs na lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyams su myong zhes brjod cing dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes bsgrubs na lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nyams su myong zhes brjod cing dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If you practice the wisdom-awareness initiation, you experience the nature of the connate, it is said, and joy arises.

original: de la dga' zhing mgu pas ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i gtam yang mi shes so //
analyzed: de la dga' zhing mgu pas ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i gtam yang mi shes so //
translated: But if you are pleased and delighted with that, you will not understand the Dharma-seal discourse.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya ma shes pas las kyi phyag rgya bcos ma 'ba' zhig las lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin bcos ma ma yin pa ji ltar 'gyur zhing skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya ma shes pas las kyi phyag rgya bcos ma 'ba' zhig las lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin bcos ma ma yin pa ji ltar 'gyur zhing skye bar 'gyur /
translated: If you do not understand the Dharma seal, how could the unfabricated nature of the connate arise and be born from only the fabricated karma seal?

original: rigs mthun pa'i rgyu las rigs mthun @78a * //üîΩpa'i 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa'i rgyu las rigs mthun @78a * // pa'i 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur gyi //
translated: A result of a similar type arises from a cause of a similar type.

original: rigs mi mthun pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: A result of a dissimilar type does not arise from a cause of a dissimilar type.

original: ji ltar s'a lu'i sa bon las s'a lu'i myu gu skye bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: ji ltar s'a lu'i sa bon las s'a lu'i myu gu skye bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: For example, a rice sprout arises from a rice seed,

original: drug cu pa las ma yin no //
analyzed: drug cu pa las ma yin no //
translated: not from a barley seed.

original: de bzhin du ma bcos pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin las ma bcos pa'i lhan cig skyes pa la 'byung ngo ;
analyzed: de bzhin du ma bcos pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin las ma bcos pa'i lhan cig skyes pa la 'byung ngo ;
translated: In the same way, the unfabricated connate arises from the unfabricated nature of the Dharma seal.

original: / de'i phyir chos kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu nyid la dbyer med par spyod pas phyag rgya chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / de'i phyir chos kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu nyid la dbyer med par spyod pas phyag rgya chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because of the indivisible practice of the cause of the Dharma-seal, it is the cause of the Great Seal.

original: de ltar na gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar na gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, the Blessed One has said:

original: ae yi cha byad bzang po la //
analyzed: ae yi cha byad bzang po la //
translated: ‚ÄúThe excellent form of the letter E

original: dbus su wam gis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: dbus su wam gis rnam par brgyan //
translated: is adorned in the middle with the letter VAM.

original: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
translated: It is the abode of all bliss,üîΩthe jewel casket of the Buddha.‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces pa ni sangs rgyas kyi grib ma'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces pa ni sangs rgyas kyi grib ma'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it follows the shadow of the Buddha.

original: za ma tog ni gnas sam gzhi'o //
analyzed: za ma tog ni gnas sam gzhi'o //
translated: A casket is an abode or basis.

original: de'i phyir las kyi phyag rgya yan lag can las dga' ba yid du 'ong ba ni rin chen 'byung gnas dang mtsho skyes kyis te /
analyzed: de'i phyir las kyi phyag rgya yan lag can las dga' ba yid du 'ong ba ni rin chen 'byung gnas dang mtsho skyes kyis te /
translated: Therefore, the pleasant joy from the embodied karma-mudra is from Ratnasa·πÉbhava and SƒÅgaranƒÅtha.

original: de ni rdo rje dang padma bsrub cing bsrubs pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor bas /
analyzed: de ni rdo rje dang padma bsrub cing bsrubs pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor bas /
translated: That is the correct union of the churning of the vajra and lotus.

original: kun rdzob byang sems aa ba dh'u t'i nas ji srid nor bu'i nang du song ba de ni de'i skad cig ma zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: kun rdzob byang sems aa ba dh'u t'i nas ji srid nor bu'i nang du song ba de ni de'i skad cig ma zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The relative bodhicitta moves up through the avadh≈´ti until it reaches the jewel. That is called ‚Äúits moment.‚Äù

original: de lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes //
analyzed: de lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes //
translated: That is called the ‚Äúconnate pristine awareness.‚Äù

original: skad cig tsam skye bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: skad cig tsam skye bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: It arises for just a moment,

original: de lhan cig skyes pa ni ma yin ti /
analyzed: de lhan cig skyes pa ni ma yin ti /
translated: but it is not the connate pristine awareness.

original: rgyu mi mthun pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu mi mthun pa'o //
translated: It is a cause that is not concordant.

original: de'i rang bzhin shes rab ye shes kyi dga' ba gsum dang / skad cig ma bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin shes rab ye shes kyi dga' ba gsum dang / skad cig ma bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Its nature is the three joys of the wisdom of the wisdom consort empowerment and the four moments.

original: dbang btsan thabs kyi sbyor ba las ni las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur gsungs so //
analyzed: dbang btsan thabs kyi sbyor ba las ni las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur gsungs so //
translated: It is said that the natural result of the karma consort empowerment is the result that is concordant with the karma consort empowerment.

original: las kyi phyag rgya'i dbang nges bar bstan pa ste dang pa'o /
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya'i dbang nges bar bstan pa ste dang pa'o /
translated: This concludes the first chapter, the introduction to the karma consort empowerment.üîΩThe Dharma consort empowerment

original: // / aom chos kyi phyag rgya ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: // / aom chos kyi phyag rgya ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: The Dharma consort is the nature of the dharmadhatu.

original: spros pa dang bral ba rnam par mi rtog pa ma bcos pa /
analyzed: spros pa dang bral ba rnam par mi rtog pa ma bcos pa /
translated: It is free from conceptual elaborations, nonconceptual, unfabricated,

original: skye ba dang bral ba /
analyzed: skye ba dang bral ba /
translated: free from arising,

original: snying rje'i rang bzhin mchog tu dga' bas gcig tu mdzes pa'i thabs su 'gyur pa /
analyzed: snying rje'i rang bzhin mchog tu dga' bas gcig tu mdzes pa'i thabs su 'gyur pa /
translated: and the supreme joy that is the nature of compassion. It is the method that is the sole ornament.

original: rgyun gyis rtag pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab dang lhan cig skyes pa las 'byung ba /
analyzed: rgyun gyis rtag pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab dang lhan cig skyes pa las 'byung ba /
translated: The ‚Äúcontinuously constant‚Äù is the arising from the innate, together with the innate wisdom.

original: dbyer med pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi phyag rgyar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dbyer med pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi phyag rgyar rig par bya'o //
translated: The ‚Äúindivisible‚Äù is to be known as the Dharma Seal.

original: gzhan yang de'i mtshan nyid ni dper na mun pas kun du 'khrugs pa la /
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i mtshan nyid ni dper na mun pas kun du 'khrugs pa la /
translated: Moreover, its characteristic is like the sun‚Äôs rays in the midst of the turmoil of darkness.

original: nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar bla ma'i man ngag nyid kyis mi shes pa'i mun pas kun nas 'khrugs pa'i 'khrul pa rtsva rdul tsam @78b gyi zug rdu rnam par spangs nas rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar bla ma'i man ngag nyid kyis mi shes pa'i mun pas kun nas 'khrugs pa'i 'khrul pa rtsva rdul tsam @78b gyi zug rdu rnam par spangs nas rtogs pa'o //
translated: In the same way, by the guru‚Äôs instruction, one should understand the abandonment of the turmoil of error in the midst of the turmoil of the darkness of ignorance, like a thorn of grass.

original: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ste khams bzhi'i nus pas bcings pa'i 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa gcig gi rang bzhin dba' rlabs med pa'i stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ste khams bzhi'i nus pas bcings pa'i 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa gcig gi rang bzhin dba' rlabs med pa'i stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know the three worlds, bound by the power of the four elements, earth, water, fire, and wind, as the single nature, the emptiness and compassion that are inseparable, without waves.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs ba ;
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs ba ;
translated: The BhagavƒÅn also said:

original: mdzes ma shes rab rang bzhin la //
analyzed: mdzes ma shes rab rang bzhin la //
translated: ‚ÄúO beautiful lady, the nature of wisdom

original: ro ma thabs kyis yang dag gnas //
analyzed: ro ma thabs kyis yang dag gnas //
translated: The roma is the means of abiding in reality.

original: sdig spangs ma ni dbus nyid du //
analyzed: sdig spangs ma ni dbus nyid du //
translated: The madhyama is in the middle,

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //üîΩde ltar rab tu 'bad pas kyang //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs // de ltar rab tu 'bad pas kyang //
translated: free from the duality of subject and object.üîΩThus, one should know the path by means of the effort

original: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa nye ba'i rgyur gyur pa de ni lam du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa nye ba'i rgyur gyur pa de ni lam du shes par bya'o //
translated: The aspect of suchness is the cause of the proximity of the path.

original: lam du shes pas gus pas rgyun mi 'chad pa ni lam mo //
analyzed: lam du shes pas gus pas rgyun mi 'chad pa ni lam mo //
translated: The path is the uninterrupted devotion to the path.

original: 'gog pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin mngon du byed par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin mngon du byed par gyur pa'o //
translated: Cessation is the manifestation of the innate nature.

original: de bzhin du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
analyzed: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
translated: There is nothing to be removed here,

original: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
analyzed: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
translated: not the slightest thing to be added.

original: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
analyzed: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
translated: Realize reality as it is.

original: yang dag mthong nas rnam par grol /
analyzed: yang dag mthong nas rnam par grol /
translated: When reality is seen, one is liberated.

original: mdzes ma ro ma dag gi dbus su gnas pa ni sdig spangs ma'o //
analyzed: mdzes ma ro ma dag gi dbus su gnas pa ni sdig spangs ma'o //
translated: The madhyama is in the middle of the roma and the la√±cana.

original: de nyid la lhag par mos pas lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi don go 'phang ma lus par sems rtse gcig pa dang / bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid la lhag par mos pas lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyi don go 'phang ma lus par sems rtse gcig pa dang / bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By having special devotion to that, one will understand the meaning of the innate nature with a one-pointed mind and will realize it through the intimate instructions of the sublime guru.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po dbyer med pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po dbyer med pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: The dharma mudra is the cause of the indivisibility of the great mudra.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur nges par bstan pa ste gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur nges par bstan pa ste gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the second chapter, the explanation of the definite result of the ripening of the dharma mudra.

original: // / a'a:phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya yang yin la chen po yang yin pas phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: // / a'a:phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya yang yin la chen po yang yin pas phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: AUM. That which is both a mudra and great is the great mudra.

original: rang bzhin med pa nyid shes bya la sogs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa nyid shes bya la sogs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa /
translated: It is the elimination of the obscurations of the object of knowledge and so on.

original: ston ka'i nyi ma phyed kyi nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa /
analyzed: ston ka'i nyi ma phyed kyi nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa /
translated: It is stainless like the sky at midday in autumn.

original: phun sum tshogs pa mtha' dag gi gzhir gyur pa /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa mtha' dag gi gzhir gyur pa /
translated: It is the basis of all excellence.

original: 'khor ba dang mya ngan gyi mtha' las 'das pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya ngan gyi mtha' las 'das pa gcig pa'i rang bzhin /
translated: It is the nature of the transcendence of samsara and nirvana.

original: dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i lus bde pa chen po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i lus bde pa chen po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The body of non-referential compassion is the nature of great bliss.

original: de bzhin du yid la byed pa med pa'i chos dge ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yid la byed pa med pa'i chos dge ba'o //
translated: Likewise, the Dharma of non-attention is virtuous.üîΩThe Dharma of attention is non-virtuous.

original: yid la byed pa'i chos mi dge pa'i zhes gsungs pa dang / kun du rtogs pas ma brtags pa //üîΩrab tu mi gnas pa yi yid //
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i chos mi dge pa'i zhes gsungs pa dang / kun du rtogs pas ma brtags pa // rab tu mi gnas pa yi yid //
translated: The mind that is not thoroughly examined by conceptualizationüîΩis not at all stable.

original: dran pa med cing yid byed min //
analyzed: dran pa med cing yid byed min //
translated: It is without mindfulness and without attention.üîΩHomage to the non-referential!

original: dmigs pa med la phyag 'tshal @79a * //
analyzed: dmigs pa med la phyag 'tshal @79a * //
translated: Homage to the non-referential!

original: 'dud ; ces bya ba gang yin pa de phyag rgya chen po yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dud ; ces bya ba gang yin pa de phyag rgya chen po yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: This is to be known as the great seal.

original: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las /
translated: Therefore, from the inconceivable nature of the great seal,

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya mchog gi 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya mchog gi 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the supreme result of the pledge seal will arise.

original: phyag rgya chen po dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu nges par bstan pa ste gsum pa'o /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu nges par bstan pa ste gsum pa'o /
translated: This concludes the third chapter on the definitive teaching of the stainless result of the great seal.

original: // / h'um dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin dang po'i ngo bo nyid sems can gyi don gyi phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka'i rnam par spros pa /
analyzed: // / h'um dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin dang po'i ngo bo nyid sems can gyi don gyi phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka'i rnam par spros pa /
translated: The pledge seal is the nature of the form of the Enjoyment and Emanation Bodies, the nature of the original being, emanated for the sake of sentient beings in the form of Vajra-holder Heruka.

original: de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'dod do //
analyzed: de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'dod do //
translated: That is asserted as the pledge seal.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya blangs te zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i rnam pa ye shes lnga'i cho ga yongs su brtag pa ni me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba nan tan dang / chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams dang /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya blangs te zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i rnam pa ye shes lnga'i cho ga yongs su brtag pa ni me long lta bu dang mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba nan tan dang / chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams dang /
translated: Having taken up the pledge seal means that the imagination of the rite of the five pristine awarenesses in the form of the wheel is the five pristine awarenesses: the mirror-like, the equality, the individual realization, the performance, and the pristine awareness realm, which are extremely pure.

original: sbyor ba dang po dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / las rgyal mchog dang / thig le'i rnal 'byor dang / phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'i slob dpon des ni bsod nams byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba dang po dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / las rgyal mchog dang / thig le'i rnal 'byor dang / phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'i slob dpon des ni bsod nams byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The master who meditates on the wheel of the pledge seal by means of the first yoga, the supreme royal mandala, the supreme royal action, the yoga of the drop, and the subtle yoga, has created merit.

original: des kyang chos kyi phyag rgya'i 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: des kyang chos kyi phyag rgya'i 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te /
translated: But he will not attain the result of the doctrine seal.

original: nges pa'i don gyi rgyu las nges pa'i 'bras bu de nyid skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nges pa'i don gyi rgyu las nges pa'i 'bras bu de nyid skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The result of the definitive meaning arises from the cause of the definitive meaning.

original: de'i phyir brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po gang byis pas kun du brtags pa de dag lhan cig skyes pa'i ros phug na de byang chub kyi gser du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po gang byis pas kun du brtags pa de dag lhan cig skyes pa'i ros phug na de byang chub kyi gser du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, whatever things are imagined by the childish, whether they are stable or moving, when they are penetrated by the taste of the connate, they become the gold of enlightenment.

original: 'dis ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo yang dag par bsgoms par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo yang dag par bsgoms par 'gyur te /
translated: By this, one meditates on the wheel of the three worlds.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sngags bzlas med cing dka' thub med de sbyin sreg med //
analyzed: sngags bzlas med cing dka' thub med de sbyin sreg med //
translated: No mantra recitation, no austerities, no fire offerings,

original: dkyil 'khor med de dkyil 'khor ba yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor med de dkyil 'khor ba yang yod ma yin //
translated: There is no ma·πá·∏çala, nor even that which is in the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: de ni sngags bzlas de ni dka' thub sbyin sreg de'o //
analyzed: de ni sngags bzlas de ni dka' thub sbyin sreg de'o //
translated: That is the recitation of mantras, that is the austerity, that is the fire offering.

original: de ni dkyil 'khor yin te dkyil 'khor pa yang de'o //
analyzed: de ni dkyil 'khor yin te dkyil 'khor pa yang de'o //
translated: That is the ma·πá·∏çala, and that is that which is in the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: mdor bsdus na ni sems su 'dus pa'i tshul can no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdus na ni sems su 'dus pa'i tshul can no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: In brief, it is the way of being included in the mind, as the Blessed One has said.

original: mdor bsdus pa ni chos thams cad gcig gi rnam pa ste gang zhe na bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ni chos thams cad gcig gi rnam pa ste gang zhe na bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: In brief, all phenomena are of one kind. What is that? It is the nature of great bliss.

original: sems ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: sems ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The mind is the mind of enlightenment.

original: 'dus pa'i tshul ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang // phyag rgya chen po'i dbang @79b gis ni //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i tshul ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang // phyag rgya chen po'i dbang @79b gis ni //
translated: The way of being included is by the empowerment of the dharma mudrƒÅ and the mahƒÅmudrƒÅ.

original: ye shes gang yin pa de nyid 'dus pa'i tshul mngon par brjod do //
analyzed: ye shes gang yin pa de nyid 'dus pa'i tshul mngon par brjod do //
translated: That very wisdom is expressed as the way of being included.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu nges par bstan pa ste bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu nges par bstan pa ste bzhi pa'o //
translated: This concludes the explanation of the result of human effort, the samayamudrƒÅ.

original: phyag rgya bzhi gtan la dbab pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi gtan la dbab pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The Ascertainment of the Four Seals composed by the great master NƒÅgƒÅrjunagarbha is complete.

original: // / bla ma dhi ri shr'i dzny'a na'i zhabs dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / bla ma dhi ri shr'i dzny'a na'i zhabs dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: The venerable master Dhƒ´rƒ´≈õvaraj√±ƒÅna and the Tibetan translator Rma ban Ch√∂bar translated and revised this text.
